original_text: I always thank God because of you. I thank him because he has been very kind to you. He has helped you like that because you belong to Christ Jesus.
korean_text: 그리스도 예수 안에서 너희에게 주신 하나님의 은혜로 말미암아 내가 너희를 위하여 항상 하나님께 감사하노니

sentences.original_text: I always thank God because of you.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 항상 너희 때문에 하나님께 감사합니다.

sentences.original_text: because he has been very kind to you.
He has helped you like that
because you belong to Christ Jesus.
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 그리스도 예수께 속해 있기 때문입니다.
